title: Named Ranges
text: A named range allows you to assign a name to a range of cells. This will not access the number of bags in the inventory.

title: Conditional Formatting
text: Conditional formatting allows you to highlight different cells based off of certain criteria, and filter the spreadsheet based on the criteria and property.

title: Creating a Filter
text: A filter allows you to display only the rows that meet certain conditions. It would work visually, but is not automatic.

title: Alternating Colors
text: Alternating colors displays every other row in a different color. It will not be able to check the number of bags in the inventory, the quantity we are interested in.
